channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: France’s post-election political chaos sets the stage for a weak government and a lower global profile
item.description: “The absence of majority and the absence of government will expose France and French people to formidable danger.”

item.title: Democratic power players are circulating a proposal for Biden to exit, launch 'blitz primary'
item.description: President Biden is facing escalating pressure to drop out of the 2024 race against Donald Trump, following his high-profile debate flop.

item.title: How stock-market investors are making sense of Biden candidacy uncertainty
Paramount Global special committee backs merger with David Ellison’s Skydance Media
item.description: The full board is set to approve the deal with the parties signing final paperwork Sunday and an announcement coming as soon as Monday.

item.title: French Prime Minister Gabriel Attal to tender resignation
item.description: France now looks likely to be stranded in a hung-parliament scenario that divides it between three strongly represented parties that must broker alliances to gain absolute control.

item.title: This week’s U.S. inflation report could have serious implications for stocks
Hedge funds have no idea what to do about Tesla as shares rally while Trump, tariffs, and backlash against ‘woke’ EVs loom
item.description: It’s not clear if Tesla is “a top company with a great management team” or “a challenged franchise with deficient corporate governance.”

item.title: France's left-wing coalition thwarts far right in parliamentary run-off vote
item.description: A period of horse-trading and instability is now likely to take hold in France, as political alliances are forged with the aim of forming a government.

item.title: Paramount moves closer to finalizing merger with Skydance: reports
Texas braces for Beryl as storm threatens to regain hurricane strength before making landfall
item.description: A hurricane warning extended from Baffin Bay, south of Corpus Christi, to Sargent, south of Houston.

item.title: Biden faces a 'vital week' to convince voters he can beat Trump, Sen. Murphy says
item.description: Five House Democrats so far have publicly called on President Biden to bow out of the 2024 race against Donald Trump.

item.title: Wall Street is feeling better than normal about Q2 earnings. Will companies?
Euro falls as France’s left wing looks to score stunning election victory, raising fears of more spending and deeper deficits
item.description: The common currency slipped 0.3% to around $1.0807 at the start of the session in Asia.

item.title: Texas coastal residents told to expect power outages, flooding as Beryl moves closer to landfall
item.description: The earliest storm to develop into a Category 5 hurricane in the Atlantic, Beryl caused at least 11 deaths while tearing through the Caribbean.

item.title: The rush to exit commercial real-estate funds is going mainstream
